Initializer# init(emailAddress:label:)

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
init(
    emailAddress emailAddressString: String,
    label: IntentPerson.Handle.Label = .other
)
```
